description: This is a Flutter widget implementation for a booking screen in a mobile application, allowing users to select check-in and check-out dates, display booking summaries, and create room reservations.

classes.name: BookingScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that provides UI for creating a booking, including date selection, displaying room details, and booking confirmation.

classes.name: _BookingScreenState
classes.description: State class for BookingScreen managing date selection, booking creation, navigation, and UI updates.

methods.name: _selectCheckInDate
methods.description: Displays a date picker to select check-in date and updates state.

methods.name: _selectCheckOutDate
methods.description: Displays a date picker to select check-out date and updates state.

methods.name: _createBooking
methods.description: Handles booking creation by invoking the bookings service and navigating upon success.
